sentences: Stephen F. Cooper (born 1948)  is a businessman and the current CEO of the Warner Music Group.
He previously served as Vice-Chairman of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was also CEO of Hawaiian Telcom.
Stephen Cooper became CEO of Warner Music Group in August 2011, replacing Edgar Bronfman Jr., who then became Chairman of the company upon Cooper's appointment.
Cooper is a Gary, Indiana native and a father to two.
In 2017, Cooper's total salary was reported to be $15,206,818.
